alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 19 at 1:59AM CDT until June 19 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Clarke County in east central Mississippi... Southeastern Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 159 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Causeyville, or 12 miles southeast of Meridian, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Snell around 205 AM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
